DataElement.preferredName: No Platinum Recent Patient Interval Eligibility Determination Most Recent Time Interval
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A eligibility question asking how long the patients' most recent platinum-free interval has been._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures._Nearest to the present._The period of time or the distance separating two instances of months being absent of a platinum-free interval. The first interval is less than 6 month. The second one is greater than or equal to 6 months  but less than 12 months.
